18100000.text:
Have you seen what Thiefhogs carry on their heads?
Fruits, crabs, fish, and all other kinds of delicacies that are in high demand at the market.
If you collect them for us, we'll reward you well.

18100001.text: Those stupid Hedgies are giving me a headache. I can't find any earthworms to use as bait because of them. Please make them go away, and I'll make it worth your while.

18100002.text: I saw a Hedgie carrying something shiny. I bet it was its lucky charm, meow. Bring it to me, and I'll give you something nice in return.

18100003.text: I smelled your iris scent from the fluttering lotus leaves... Oops, my apologies. I was reciting a line of poetry that I just came up with. It's not a big deal. Please bring me some Lotus Leaf Pieces.

18100004.text:
Please get rid of the Lilybads. It's not once or twice that I've collapsed in fright because of the Lilybads that pop up out of the lake.
I can't live like this.

18100005.text:
After looking at those Lilybads, I came up with this great business idea.
I want to make umbrellas out of their huge lotus leaves.
Doesn't that sound brilliant? Hah hah!
Please bring me some Intact Lotus Leaves.

18100006.text: I want to get some wood from the Rotten Lumber Camp, but I can't even get near that place because of the Ratmen. Please take care of them for me, and I'll reward you in the name of the Sol Seekers.

18100007.text:
Judging from the smell, the wind must be blowing from the sea. This Fish Network is farther inland than the Harbor, but it smells worse around here than it does there. Grr!
Please take care of these stinky Ratmen. I'll pay you handsomely for your help.

18100008.text:
I don't know why anyone would want to study the weapons of such lowly beings, but like everyone else, I have to do what I'm told.
Please bring me a number of weapons from the Ratmen.
I'll repay you accordingly.

18100009.text: The durable shells from Lake Turtles are used for many different purposes. Speaking of which, could you bring me some Intact Turtle Carapaces? I'll repay you.

18100010.text: The turtles have become violent because you people threw your trash everywhere. Don't blame the turtles for reacting to what you did! The least you could do is pick up some trash to help fix this.

18100011.text: The turtles are on a rampage, killing all the fish in Turtle Lake. Those fish are our livelihood—our lifeblood! Please drive away those Lake Turtles. I'll repay you handsomely.

18100012.text: There are so many things in the Ruins that we want to examine, but we can't because of those mysterious creatures purr-ading about the place. Adventurer, please take care of them for us, meow.

18100013.text:
You look fur-miliar, meow.
I know we've definitely never met before, but somehow, I get the feeling we have.
Please help us investigate.
We'll repay you if you do.

18100014.text: A rare substance has been discovered around the Ruins. They're the fragments that fall off the moving rocks there. Adventurer, you can get some, can't you?

18100015.text: We Edeta have been paying extra attention to the Bottomless Pit. It's necessary in order to prevent the tragedy that took place there before from happening again. Please help us defeat the Hollows.

18100016.text: Some of them that come pouring out of the Fissure are far more powerful than Hollows. Please defeat them and help the Edeta!

18100017.text:
My name is Kunale, and I'm obsessed with the Fissure. Teehee!
Please collect traces of the Fissure from Hollows for me, and I'll repay you. Obviously, I'm too weak to do that on my own. Teehee!
Thank you!

18100018.text:
The Gnarloxes keep scaring my sheep, causing them to tip over.
My poor sheep... adventurer, please find it in your
heart to save them!

18100019.text: I need a medicinal ingredient to treat an endemic disease on the Haewol continent. I've heard Gnarlox's Leaves are effective against that disease. Adventurer, please get them for me.

18100020.text: There's a medicinal ingredient that I always keep on hand. It's easily found around the Pasture. Please bring it to me, and I'll pay you accordingly.

18100021.text: Scarlet Bulbari Grass creates a beautiful color, but we're not strong enough to fight the Bulbaries for their grass. Could you get it for us?

18100022.text: Golden Bulbari Grass is not exactly easy to get. That's why it's always in high demand. I'll reward you if you bring some to me.

18100023.text:
I lost a Manual while passing through the
Pasture, meow. I went back there several times, but I couldn't find it.
Please find it for me...

18100024.text:
The Blue Bandits ganged up on my men.
Could you get revenge for them on those Blue Bandits? I'll repay you handsomely.

18100025.text:
The Blue Bandits are using uniquely crafted weapons.
The technology used on them is similar to that of the Eastern continent, and yet somehow different.
I want to take a closer look at them. Could you bring them to me?

18100026.text:
The surprising new fashion these days happens to be
Blue Bandits' accessories!
We, the Peach Blossom, must capitalize on this!
Please bring some to me, and I'll repay you well.

18100027.text:
Those arrogant Blue Bandits... We let them get away with a few things, and now they want to take over our territory.
Please teach them a lesson they'll never forget.
I'll repay you handsomely.

18100028.text: Bears and saberfangs on Rocky Hill are terrorizing the residents. Please drive them away, and I'll repay you. Oh, and please keep this a secret from Gray Breeze because he'll be angry at me if he finds out.

18100029.text:
Leather from has many uses.
Speaking of which, please collect some Intact Leather from the bears and saberfangs on Rocky Hill.
I'll pay you fairly for your work.

18100030.text:
I lost my bundle while trying to run away from the wild animals on the Rocky Hill. It's not as if we want to lose our bundles. We can't help it: when they pounce at us, all we can do is drop everything and run.
Please find my bundle. I'll repay you.

18100031.text:
The forest trail used to be a popular resting place and promenade among the residents. Lately, though, it's become too dangerous because of the forest spirits.
Adventurer, please reclaim the forest trail for us.

18100032.text:
I dropped my bundle somewhere along the forest trail while trying to escape the Tree Spirit that showed up out of nowhere.
I went back to find it, but the animals must have taken it. After all, I couldn't find it where I dropped it.Please find it for me.

18100033.text:
The horns of the Mountain Rams that live on Highland Central Trail are known for their resilience and can be used as medicinal ingredients. However, that place is swarming with the Poacher Gang and Blueskins.
I'll reward you if you collect some for me!

18100034.text:
Tree Spirit Twigs are especially helpful in communing with spirits,
meow. But we can't fight the spirits or get their twigs
ourselves. Adventurer, please bring us some Tree Spirit Twigs.

18100035.text:
Those Poacher Gang members are pushing many animal species to the brink of extinction.
Stop those evil poachers, and I'll reward you well.
Please bring peace back to the wild animals of the Sapphire Basin.

18100036.text:
There are animal corpses littered on the Highland Central Trail because of the Poacher Gang's reckless actions.
If you happen to come across some bones on the Highland Central Trail, please relocate them. I'll reward you for your work.

18100037.text:
Please find my doll!
I-I think Mature Spirits and Child Spirits took it.
Boohoo! My precious doll...!

18100038.text:
We must appease all the spirits in the Deep Forest Graveyard, meow.
We've been trying hard, but clearly, this task is beyond our ability...
Adventurer, you don't need magic to do it. Just use force to make them cross over!

18100039.text: I, not Mr. Kim. Ah, I, not Dokkaebi, either. Dokkaebis. Bullies. Bad. Punish for me.

18100040.text:
Oh, it seems the Hollows coming out of the Fissure aren't the only ones that carry its traces; the consumed beings carry them too.
Please collect traces of the Fissure from them, and I'll reward you.

18100041.text: We must reclaim our village, plog! Before that, retrieve my luggage from the village! I'm counting on you, plog!

18100042.text: We must reclaim our village, plog! Please exterminate the alligators and the Ratmen that are ruining our home. Get rid of those arrogant monsters!

18100043.text:
I've received a report that there are Hollows created differently from the others.
Please eliminate these consumed beings.
I want to look into them
and help the Ploggles there at the same time.

18100044.text:
Complete [2] Chivalry quests for us, the Sol Seekers, and we'll give you a special reward.
It'll be given to you in the name of the Captain.
Good luck.

18100045.text:
We, the Edeta, offer a special reward in the name of the Captain to adventurers who complete [2] Chivalry quests for us.
Please help us eliminate the energy of the Hollows.

18100046.text:
We, the Peach Blossom, offer a small token of appreciation to those who complete [4] Chivalry quests for us. We make our payments on time, down to the last coin!
Thank you for your participation!

18100047.text:
We, the Soul Bridge, offer a special reward to adventurers who complete [3] Chivalry quests for us. We Barons never forget to keep our promises, meow.
Thank you for your help.

18100048.text:
We, the Soul Steel, offer a special reward in the name of the Master to those who complete [2] Chivalry quests for us. It's a promise.
You just have to complete [2] quests.

18100049.text: We, the Fish Network, offer a special reward to those who complete [4] Chivalry quests for us. Thank you for your participation.

18100050.text: Help the locals, and we Enigma Council will thank you on their behalf. Just complete [4] Chivalry quests from the locals. We'll be waiting for you.

18101000.text: Oil-greased Bulbari grass burns well. Some places use it as fuel. If you bring the grass, we'll purchase it for a reasonable price.

18101001.text: There's still much to research about spider webs. If we could collect a large amount of spider web protein, we could achieve progress in our research for future generations. It'd be only natural that we pay you if you help us, right?

18101002.text:
There's always a steady demand for animal leather, and it rarely gets moldy or musty thanks to advances in processing and storage methods. We'll guarantee a suitable price for anyone who brings some leather.
Any quantity is welcome.

18101003.text:
I've lost the manual again, meow... This manual seems to have paws of its own, since it's always missing! I think I lost near the East Ecological Research Site, but I can't find it anywhere!
Please find it for me...

18101004.text:
You are able to defend a large area with fewer soldiers and a well-set line of defense. We must find a good location to get rid of the enemy and build our defenses.
Would you be able to help us drive the Greenhorns out?

18101005.text:
Wolves hunt in packs.They're very intelligent and difficult for a small number of soldiers to deal with.
If you could defeat the pack and disperse them, we Edeta plan to defeat the remaining wolf stragglers.

18101006.text: Bulbari is a wonderful material for making dye. I'm looking forward to seeing what kind of dyes we can get from the Bulbari at Haewol. Please collect a large quantity of Stem Bulbari Grass!

18101007.text:
Not only are Mandaravas violent and harmful, but they also cause a deafening noise.
Many of the members are complaining about them.
We'll pay you if you can bring back peace and quiet to the area.

18101008.text:
There's a dish the artisans enjoy.
It might not sound appealing to some... However, the people here truly love eating it.
Please collect Hermit Crabs and bring me what's inside the shell.

18101009.text:
I heard people eat turtle eggs because they're considered a delicacy. If we over-harvest them just because they're plentiful now, they might become scarce in the future.
We do hunt a lot of turtles... But I believe the eggs should be spared.
If you could collect the turtle eggs, we'll protect them.

18101010.text: The robust shells of shore turtles have many uses. We need a whole turtle shell for our Elucidator Scholar mission. Please deliver it in the best condition possible.

18101011.text:
Although we Elucidator Scholars do have enough combat power to protect ourselves, we are not an armed group, so we still have clear limitations. We know this better than anyone else.
Therefore, we'd like to ask you to eliminate the Oduksinis.

18101012.text:
We'd like to live in harmony with the crocodiles if only they wouldn't attack us...
But there have been victims near the coast. We can't stop people from going there, either...
Please just get rid of the crocodiles.

18101013.text: I need new materials to make a basket. Could you get me some plant stems from Windpath Valley? I'm terrified of the enemies in that area, and I just can't bring myself to go there.

18101014.text: I lost the bundle I was carrying at the Windpath Valley while being chased by a bear. I need to go find it... But I'm afraid I'll lose more if I run into that bear again... It's better to leave it to an expert, right? You're the best person to do this job!

18101015.text:
The Sol Seekers have declared war on the Scarlet Masks!
It'll only end when either side is completely eradicated.
...Of course, the Sol Seekers will never be defeated. Never in a thousand years!

18101016.text:
I hear that the higher-up members of the Scarlet Masks carry bandanas with them.
I don't really know why, but they annoy me.
Could you collect those bandanas? Then I can just burn them all!

18101017.text: Please eliminate Moonwind's Illusion. Strange rumors have been spreading because of it. Please do it, if only for Moonwind's honor.

18101018.text:
The Soul Bridge has been researching various herbs, mrrow!
We previously believed the Spitting Plant to be a monster, but now we think that it might be an herb, purr!
We must investigate the Spitting Plant Leaf!

18101019.text:
When Horyong heard about the illusion, he told us not to worry about it, assuring us that he wasn't that weak.
Nevertheless, we the Peach Blossom must consider our reputation.
Please, take care of this problem for us.

18101020.text:
Ugh, soon I'll have to go to the Foggy Forest Settlement to do some business there, and I've just heard the road is infested with Illusion Mantises. Even us peddlers have a reputation to protect. I can't just not go when I promised to be there.
Please have some mercy and help me out.

18101021.text:
I'm investigating the Swamp, and the Lilybads keep popping out of nowhere and surprising me, hiss!
I can't focus on my research like this, meow!
Please, get rid of those Lilybads!

18101022.text:
Numerous people fall victim to the poisonous Snakecaps.
If you could catch a Snakecap and deliver it to me, I plan to make an antidote that can save countless lives!

18101023.text: There's been an increasing number of strange sightings at the cemetery. We haven't been able to assess the situation yet. However, we should at least get rid of the Fiery Souls in the area.

18101024.text:
There was a sudden increase of Scarlet Masks around the graveyard.
I don't think there's anything they would need over there.
We don't know what they're up to,
so we'd better get rid of them.

18101025.text:
I'm currently developing a remedy for the Edeta Members. I believe my research on the Simyu Moss Fox can lead to a universal remedy.
However, the members aren't keen on going to that area.
Would you collect some Moss Fox's Feet for me?

18101026.text:
Good quality leather is always welcome.
The Peach Blossom provide us with good leather, but a true artisan always wants even better quality!
I hear the Swamp Crocodile's leather is strong and versatile...

18101027.text: There's a subtle species difference among the Nepenthes, purr! We're going to need more data for our Nepenthes research! Go get me some Nepenthes Leaves at the swamp, meow!

18101028.text: Do the Simyu enjoy destroying everything they see? The Chivalry Quest Board we installed at Haewol has been destroyed by the Simyu. I'd like to ask you to get rid of them so that we won't have any more trouble from them... Would you be wiling to look into it?

18101029.text:
I tried creating an umbrella from an intact lotus leaf at the Sapphire Basin. I want to check if I can use a lotus leaf from Haewol.
Please get me an Intact Lotus Leaf!

18101030.text: We Elucidator Scholars want to preserve Grassland Knoll as the fragrant and green place that it is now. To that end, could you help us pick up litter? It'd be great if you also get rid of the Simyu who litter on that hill while you're there.

18101031.text:
We've been hearing a lot about the Gnarloxes lately.
Security might not be our main responsibility... But I believe we need to offer our help in a situation like this.
Could we ask you for your help on this?

18101032.text: Could you get us some Simyu Roc oil? I want to process the oil and grease the tree bark with it. I expect that should make the tree more resistant to moisture.

18101033.text: Goat milk is different from regular milk, purr! This will help us make a new medicine! Please get me a lot of goat milk!

18101034.text:
We have to write down many records for our work... And a good brush is essential for our profession. The fox fur at Haewol is of great quality and could be used to make a brush.
Could you get that fox's fine fur?

18101035.text: There's been cases of the Lapriels trespassing on our territory. We must protect ourselves against their attacks. Could you help us?

18101036.text: The Sunrise Climb has beautiful scenery and is on the way to the waterfall, so it's understandably popular with tourists. The Tree Spirits there are a nuisance right now, though. Help us make the Climb become safe again.

18101037.text:
The quality of the soil at Blackened Mudlands is exceptional.
Our workers have to get into the area to collect the dirt, but there's a lot of concern about safety because of the turtles and spiders.
Could you help us protect the workers?

18101038.text:
Good quality leather is always welcome. Now, it's always best to maintain various channels of trade. That way, I have an alternative in case one supply source isn't available.
I'd also like to get my hands on some Mud Crocodile leather.

18101039.text:
The Oduksinis haves overtaken the beach. It'd be best if the Sol Seekers took care of things on the coast, but because of recent events...
I think we should step up and deal with it.
We could use your help.

18101040.text: Since you've come all the way here, you should try a turtle egg! This is the real deal! You're missing out if you don't give it a try! Bring it here! I'll give you a reasonable price.

18101041.text:
I'm curious as to what medicinal effects Haewol Bulbari Leaf extract might have, meow!
We don't know yet, but there's got to be something!
Collect a good quantity of Bulbari Leaves for me, purr!

18101042.text: We, the Edeta, offer a special reward in the name of our Captain for adventurers who complete [3] Chivalry quests at the Taero Forest. Please help us eliminate the energy of the Hollows.

18101043.text: We, the Soul Steel, offer a special reward in the name of our Master to those who complete our Chivalry quests at the Taero Forest. It's a promise. You just have to complete [3] quests!

18101044.text: We, the Peach Blossom, offer a small token of appreciation to those who complete [3] Chivalry quests for us at the Taero Forest. You do understand that the word of a Peach Blossom Merchant is as good as gold? Thank you for your participation.

18101045.text:
We, the Sol Seekers, offer a large reward
if you complete [3] Chivalry quests for us at the Taero Forest. It's a special reward provided in the name of our captain.
I wish you the best of luck.

18101046.text: We, the Soul Bridge, offer a special reward to adventurers who complete [3] Chivalry quests for us at the Taero Forest! We Barons never forget to keep our promises, meow! Thank you for your help.

18101047.text:
We Elucidator Scholars believe adventurers who aid us in our exploration should be properly rewarded.
If you complete [3] Chivalry quests for us at the Taero Forest, you can look forward to a great bounty.
We'll be awaiting your service.

18101048.text:
We in Enigma Council thank you for completing the Chivalry quests at the Taero Forest.
Would you complete [2] more Chivalry quests for the residents?
We'll be waiting.

18102000.text: Although the camp is abandoned... I don't want the Hoglins using it. If you don't mind, please get rid of them.

18102001.text:
People don't like those Mandaravas because they're wild and temperamental. The worst thing about them is all that racket they make. It may seem like it's better to try and coexist with them, but at a certain point, it's just best to give up.
Get rid of the Mandaravas around the Haewol Quarters.

18102002.text: Soon, the trainees will go to the Riddle Plain for their first real training. I'm a little worried. I don't want the trainees to be in danger, so please cull the numbers of those monsters beforehand.

18102003.text: The scorpions here are notorious for their potent venom which has many uses. There are many who end up getting poisoned while trying to collect that deadly venom for money. So, more venom is needed to cure that poison, but getting the antidote leads to more accidents, too. It's a vicious cycle.

18102004.text: I don't want to name a certain organization... However, there's a lot of trash scattered on the Riddle Plain. I'm reluctant to say this to someone who's been helping secure the Plains, but could you help us out?

18102005.text: There are a lot of plump foxes in the area. The quality of their fur also seems exquisite. That fur would definitely make a lovely brush. Could you get us that fine fur from the Shroud Foxes?

18102006.text:
Protecting the residents isn't the main mission of Ivory Gale, but I believe it is our job in Caelite Land.
Since the Oduksinis are causing great harm to the residents, we'd like to request your service.

18102007.text:
The Baron Pioneers have endured numerous trials, meow.
Of course, we overcame them on our own...However, we got some vewy good advice recently. Don't take on the burden all by yourself!
That's right, purr! Now I'm going to accept help from other people, fur sure!

18102008.text:
This experiment shows that the color made from the Black Bulbari Grass has an extremely high light absorbency rate, like a black hole.
This is a revolutionary shade of black.
That's why you need to get us some Black Bulbari Grass.

18102009.text:
The saberfangs in the area have a special coat coloring. There are many wealthy people who want to get a hold of that special saberfang leather. There's a superstition about it repelling ghosts and attracting fortune...
But it isn't important if that's true or not. What's important is that it can make us money.

18102010.text: Some Consumed Soldiers and Workers still remain around the Caelite Spot. Since they came this far because they trusted us Sol Seekers, we should help them cross over in peace, but we're spread too thin at the moment. Could you help us?

18102011.text: I'm Kunale, the Fissure-Holic! I'm here to research the Fissure at Haewol! What? The Fissure occurred because I came to Haewol? That's absurd. I'll prove it to you with my research. I'll show you what the Fissure really is.

18102012.text: There might be some useful herbs growing where the bats live, purr. We have to forage the herbs quietly because of the Night Gargoyle... It's so dangerous and inefficient! I'd like fur you to eliminate the Night Gargoyles, meow!

18102013.text:
It's too dangerous for us to go and forage the herbs.
Since we don't know what's there, just pluck any wild grass you see.
I'll decide what to do if you find something of value, meow!

18102014.text: We're looking for anything in the Eastern Forest that could help us make some money. We're first going to investigate the red antlers. Maybe we could use it somehow in medicine or to make something useful.

18102015.text:
A Jellyfish which should be in the sea is floating in the sky, meow?
This might be something incredible... Raw, dried, semi-dried, frozen... I should test it for any medicinal effects in various conditions, meow.
First, if you could collect a large quantity of them...

18102016.text:
The Gnarlox Forest is used by the soldiers as a rest area. Apparently, though, the Spitting Plants in the area are disturbing and harming them.
Could you eliminate the Spitting Plants so the soldiers can rest there again?

18102017.text: I'm trying to extract dye from Roc feathers. I'd be able to get three base colors and some synthetic colors if I succeed! If that happens, the Roc might become a great source of income in the future.

18102018.text:
I see two possibilities with the Flame Plant.
The first hypothesis is that it will be helpful in generating high temperatures. The second is that will be helpful for enduring high temperatures.
The Soul Steel will look into it, if you bring a large quantity of Flame Plants.

18102019.text: If we investigate the shell of the Tarite Larva, we might find a substance which is resistant to Tarite. Could you get us a large quantity of Tarite Larva Shells? It'd help speed up our investigation.

18102020.text:
If we could put the Nepenthes tissue to good use, we might be able to use it for multiple purposes. It's still in the early stages of conception, but I'd like to get started with the research if I could get enough samples.
May I ask a favor of you?

18102021.text:
The rock at Soaring Rock Ramp seems to be of exceptional quality. The artisans are trying to collect the rock there, but the Mutant Soldiers and Warlords in the area make it difficult. The Sol Seekers aren't much help.
Could you eliminate the Mutant Soldiers?

18102022.text: To be honest, because of the finer quality of paper, I thought there'd be no reason to use parchment. However, the person who's insisting on parchment is a high-ranking official. I don't dare question why they're so stubborn about it. Making the parchment seems like the easier choice.

18102023.text: I'm curious about the quality of the tools used by the Mutant Miners. If you can, could you collect some for me? I'd like to see if there's something I can learn from them.

18102024.text: Dragonhead Cape seems like a great place for a medicinal herb to grow because of the sea breeze there, meow! But then, something there always gets in our way! At Dragonhead Cape, the Blue Bandits are the ones who are giving us trouble. I'd like for you to help us!

18102025.text:
The Hoglins took advantage of the Sol Seekers to come to Haewol. They promised to help the expedition, but after accomplishing their goals, they abandoned us. Nowadays, they've been attacking us...
If only they'd... Never mind. Please, just drive them out.

18102026.text: The expedition is ruined because of the Blue Bandits. If we want to deal with them, we need to know what we're up against. Can you get their gear for us?

18102027.text:
The Blueskin can easily be found at the Tectite Plateau.
There's no need for the Ivory Gale to intervene in a place like that... But we do need to preemptively stop them from coming over to the Caelite Land.

18102028.text:
We will appropriately reward the Warrior who has completed [2] Chivalry quests requested by the Ivory Gale in Caelite Land.
Please provide us with your service.

18102029.text:
We, the Soul Steel, offer a special reward in our name to those who complete our Chivalry quests at the Caelite Land.
You have our word. You just have to complete [2] quests!

18102030.text: We, the Peach Blossom, offer a small token of appreciation to those who complete [2] Chivalry quests for us at the Caelite Land. You do understand that a Peach Blossom Merchant's word is as good as gold! Thank you for your participation.

18102031.text: We, the Sol Seekers, offer a large reward if you complete [2] Chivalry quests for us at the Caelite Land. This is a special reward provided in the name of our captain. I wish you the best of luck.

18102032.text:
We, the Soul Bridge, offer a special reward to adventurers who complete [2] Chivalry quests for us at the Caelite Land!
We Barons never forget to keep our promises, mrrow! Thank you for your help.

18102033.text: We Elucidator Scholars believe that the adventurers who aid us in our exploration should be properly rewarded. If you complete [2] Chivalry quests for us at the Caelite Land, you can look forward to the bounty. We'll be awaiting your service.

18102034.text:
We in Enigma Council thank you for completing the Chivalry quests at the Caelite Land.
Could you complete [2] more Chivalry quests for the residents?
We'll be waiting.

18102035.text:
Isn't that the weapon the mandala is holding? 
It looks like a barong's tail straightened out.
One of our craftsmen tried to investigate it.
It looks like he approached the mandala and was attacked.
Go Would you like some help?
There are many enemies around, so be careful.

18102036.text:
There is a good herb called Shadetusk on the red slope!
From some point on, the Reddon tribe will take their place and don't move away!
The Reddon tribe eats Shadowtusk for dessert... 
That's not enough. Herbs are so precious!
Please help me make good medicines!

18102037.text:
It is said that using the tree spirit's moss 
you can increase the strength of the material.
If successful, 
we can make stronger weapons and equipment!
How to get moss? That's adventurer. You have to find this one.
Then, please take care of me.

18102038.text:
Are you saying that snake mushrooms have poison?
Of course, that poison is harmful to Barongs and others!
But, if you are a good pharmacist like me,
You can properly adjust the amount of use and suppress the effect 
and even use it as medicine. You can use it!
If you know, go to the autumnal sunset valley and get poison!

18102039.text:
The Mystery Field is a relatively safe place, so 
Newcomers also train a lot there.
The Dark Tree Spirit is difficult, so 
No one goes forward on the extermination mission. 
Someone is dealing with the Dark Tree Spirit. If you show it,
I think it will be of great help to the new recruits of Suyang.

18102040.text:
The foster crew who went out to investigate the demons
looks stranded at the scene.
Can you go there and help the foster people?
There are a lot of demons. Please take care.

18102041.text:
Our training is trying to break through the enemy's defenses.
The mutated blue-man swordsmen are set up in each area.
If only the swordsmen in key points are removed...
The advance seems to be a matter of time. I mean.
Can you take on that role?

18102042.text:
These days, weapon crafting materials are getting more and more expensive.
I thought about it. 
If you take the blue man archer's bow, it weakens the enemy! 
Can I please?

18102043.text:
If you look at the mutated blue man warrior's weapon, it has a unique shape
and there are a lot of barnacles on the surface.
Starting with why they use such a type of weapon
There are so many things I want to investigate.
 Could you get some of the mutated blue man warrior's weapon?

18102044.text:
Because bows are trendy these days, the price is strangely high.
The cost of materials has also risen significantly.
If the bow of the spear guards can be recycled,
negative for the opponent, positive for us! It's double the profit.
Then I wish you all the best.

18102045.text:
The Myunghyedan is currently researching the mutated Blue People and the Changdo gang by comparing them with each other.
Our members seem to have been caught by the Changdo dan's size and merchants during the study.
Only with the Myunghyedan's abilities, Rescue seems to be a bit difficult
I would like to ask for your help. Please.

18102046.text:
The damage caused by spiders to the hideout of disaster is extreme.
At first I warned you to avoid it in moderation...
The spiders seem to pop out of places you can't see easily.
So you can't stay still at Poongbaekmun. It seems like it.
I need to solve the problem somehow.
Can you help me?

18103000.text:
The members of Poongbaekmun were kidnapped by the Black Dawn.
I tried to rescue them somehow...
They used them as subjects.
It may be a little late, but... 
The transformed Poongbaek

18103001.text: The Black Dawn has kidnapped the members of Pungbaekmun and used them as test subjects. \nNow, we have no choice but to deal with the members of the Moon faction as enemies... \nI would like to collect even the identification tags of the members of Pungbaekmun and bury them as a group.

18103002.text: Shuyang is planning a covert infiltration operation into the enemy camp. \nBut it is difficult to carry out the operation because there are eroded search dogs. \nCan you remove the eroded search dogs?

18103003.text:
Does the Black Dawn Team have any equipment?
I wonder where they are printing such metal equipment. 
How is the quality... Of course, it can't be compared to Geumgyeongcheolmun... 
What level is it?

18103004.text:
After checking, it seems that our crews who went to the outpost aren't in good condition.
It's difficult for us to go to the rescue on our own right now.
Can you go to the outpost and destroy the surrounding enemies?
Please

18103005.text: Our Ereda will also participate in the defense of the outpost. \nPlease remove the variant Black Dawn.\nIf the number of Black Dawns decreases, we will pay for it.

18103006.text: The cemetery of the Suwa tribe was submerged in Suwa. \nThe Suwa people are not directly related to us, but the Suwa people help each other. \nPlease help the eroded Suwa there go to sleep.

18103007.text:
I am going to process the lotus leaves here to make umbrellas and raincoats.
It has already been verified with lotus leaves from other regions.
I wonder if it will work well with lotus leaves from this area.
A lotus leaf man

18103008.text: I only need to get herbs from flooded places, but it's very dangerous because a lotus man pops out in the middle. \nPlease get rid of the lotus man so we can collect them!

18103009.text:
The ghosts here seem to be the animals that used to live here. 
Maybe they became ghosts because they couldn't die comfortably while submerged... 
If our crew sees them, they're collecting them... 
The surrounding area

18103010.text: Someone says that they want to do research on life, death, and souls using the powder produced when killing ghosts.\nI think it's a bit strange, but...\nIt doesn't matter if we can make a profit.\

18103011.text: The darkness of the Ashen Sky Forest is interfering with our mission. \nWe are dealing with a small number ourselves, but... \nI think we will also need the help of experts.

18103012.text: I lost the recipe book again... \nI'm going to look for the recipe book myself this time.\nInstead, there are scary enemies around, so please help me. Please!

18103013.text: There is a theory that adding burnt antler horn powder to melting iron will improve the results. \nI don't believe it, but I'm going to try it. \nPlease get some antler horns.

18103014.text:
The Pungbaekmun crews who volunteered for the Gray Sky Forest seem to have been 
injured by dark and rusty insects. 
If you go to the Gray Sky Forest, you can eliminate the enemies
and help them escape.

18103015.text:
It is difficult to establish and maintain a defensive base because of the antlers. 
If you get stuck here, the operation will be disrupted. 
There will be many other things, but please do. 
Please reduce the number of antlers in Ashen Sky Forest.

18103016.text:
A lot of Ereda's new recruits have been dispatched this time. 
Now it seems like you're used to the subjugation mission... 
It seems difficult to deal with the elite dwarfs.
If you deal with the elite vultures,
the other enemies will be dealt with.

18103017.text:
It is said that there is a rare bird's nest around the windmill.
People say that they have been protecting it...
As monsters settle on this land, no one to protect the bird's nest disappears... 
By the monsters

18103018.text:
Wealthy people are similar, but there is something different. 
If you omit it, you think what will happen.
Tiger skin, where do you collect so much to use it...
We welcome it because it's money.

18103019.text:
You shouldn't judge or discriminate against living things based on their appearance, but... 
We also have a lot of concerns about the human insect. 
It's a form that resembles a human face and causes discomfort... 
Someone please deal with it.

18103020.text:
The hilly environment is good here, so precious herbs grow a lot.
The animals will try to avoid it somehow...
The predators follow us persistently.
Even if we move quietly, we somehow know and follow them

18103021.text:
I need a hermit plant in a hilly area. 
There are a lot of beasts around, so I can't approach it.
The beasts don't even eat hermit plants... 
I don't know why they hover around there.

18103022.text: We'll have to research whether the deer here can also be used as medicine. \nI need help trying to catch a deer and do some research. \nThe deer will be moved by our merchants, so all you need to do is hunt.

18103023.text: I accidentally picked up Hyojo's feather... \nI think it's surprisingly good for a writing instrument. \nCan you get enough of it so I can compare it with other feathers?

18103024.text: Processing the feces of the filial piety, \nI think it can be used as a fuel that generates a very high temperature. \nAfter you get rid of the filth, please collect some dung and bring it.

18103025.text: It seems that our new recruits are afraid of elite metallurgy. \nIt's just saying that elite metallurgy is strong, \nAll of a sudden, metallurgy is scary.

18103026.text: One-eyed eyes need to collect a lot of information. \nI want to investigate if there is something special about the one-eyed eyes... \nCan I get the one-eyed tears first?

18103027.text:
One-eyed guards are everywhere, 
It is hindering the operation of training. 
Would you mind clearing up some things that you can see while moving? 
This will be a great help in carrying out the operation.

18103028.text:
Because of the poison worms, the crew is taking too much damage.
Up to a certain number of them can be dealt with before they approach... 
There are too many, so we end up taking damage. 
Can someone please reduce the number of poison worms a bit?

18103029.text:
I think the ingredients in the venom of the venom will be helpful in protecting equipment. 
We want to process the venom of the banal and use it to craft equipment. 
But, it seems that the venom is too dangerous for us to do.

18103030.text:
Metallurgy is attacking people and inflicting damage. 
I thought that the number of reports of damage had decreased recently... 
The number of metallurgists did not decrease, but people left. 
Please reduce the number of metallurgists.

18103031.text: It's a pity to see ghosts. \nI'm worried about what happened to make them stay here in such a way. \nPlease help their souls to rest.

18103032.text: They say that when you kill a ghost, some ashes are blown away. \nCan you get some of that ashes?

18103033.text:
I was wondering if there was something good for 
the merchants who entered the dark forest were attacked by monsters. 
If it's okay, please get rid of the enemies around you.
We're going to go help the merchants too.

18103034.text:
The Black Dawn is doing things that no human being should ever do. 
Should we call them those who abandoned their humanity? 
The purpose is also not pure. 
Please get rid of the resulting mutant spider.

18103035.text: It's a spider's web, isn't it something you're afraid of?\nI'm a little concerned, but if our weapons become stronger through this, \nwouldn't we be able to prevent more mutant spiders from spawning?

18103036.text:
Natural swamps are like a treasure trove of living things. 
Perhaps you'll find things that you can't find anywhere else!
We need to conduct an investigation quickly, but the lotus-leaf humans popped out 
and the researcher was surprised.

18103037.text: It is said that the lotus leaf human skin tissue has the characteristic of repelling water. \nThe ability to absorb water when needed and defend from water when not needed... \nIf you could make such a fabric, it would be sold at a high price.

18103038.text:
The antlers are large and strong, so 
it is difficult to deal with unless you are a trained crew member. 
There were many seasoned crew members in Pungbaekmun... 
It's really difficult because there have been so many casualties lately.

18103039.text: It is said that if you make a flute using antlers' horns, \nthe sound is clear and spreads far away. \nIt's still just a rumor, but if we can get horns in large quantities this time, we'll try an experiment.

18103040.text:
It is said that one of the key Ereda agents was isolated in the swamp. 
We're also searching right now,
If it's okay, would you go to the scene and get rid of nearby enemies?
We'll take care of the rest.

18103041.text:
My name is Gyu-Neun Kim! I'm a rift maniac. Whoops. 
I'm here to study cracks in the Haeryong Mountains. 
Now, I'll show you what cracks are. 
And that there are no unsolved riddles in this world.

18103042.text: Right now, we are trying to focus our training power toward the Black Dawn camp.\nBut it's not easy to pull out the troops from the Burners of the Contaminated Earth right now.\nIf only the elites of the Burners are reduced, something will happen.

18103043.text:
The scouts and watchers will be obstructed when they approach to stop the burners.
If they disappear, the members of Pungbaekmun will 
be able to approach them more easily.
Would you like to get rid of the scouts and watchers as soon as they disappear?

18103044.text:
I thought that the attacks of the Burners were more terrifying than I thought...
They couldn't ignore the assassins and murderers among them.
If the number of them is reduced a bit, I think we will be able to launch an aggressive offensive.
The assassins as soon as their numbers are reduced.

18103045.text:
When you're in a confrontation with a fireman, 
their lines are too strong to break through. 
If the number of butchers, warriors, and spears decreases a bit, 
I think an effective attack will be possible...

18103046.text:
Various places appear, 
I wonder if they are the same or if they differ from region to region.
It would be appreciated if you could obtain a specimen of mortals from the polluted land.
I want to analyze the differences between regions through that.

18103047.text: There are difficulties in carrying out the operation due to the search dogs in the camp of the Black Dawn.\nIf you can eliminate them, it will be of great help to Ereda.

18103048.text: Please obtain one of their supplies from the Black Dawn's supply depot.\nIf you investigate it,\nI think you'll find out more about the Black Dawn.

18103049.text: Even beasts are being experimented with... \nI wonder how far they will fall. \nPlease kill the mutant beasts and return them to nature.

18103050.text:
It is necessary to reduce the number of Black Dawns in the Black Dawn camp. 
How many people are there... 
Whether they are alive... 
Still questionable

18103051.text:
There are people in the Black Dawn that use poison as a weapon. 
If you check the composition of the poison, you can make an antidote, or 
we may be able to make equipment that is strong against poison. 
Get enough of the poison

18103052.text:
I heard that there are herbs grown in the harsh environment of the crater.
The contaminated crater is too dangerous to enter.
There are a lot of predators around, so if you get rid of them,
I'll dig up herbs!

18103053.text: Using Hyojo's down, which is filled with the heat of the polluted crater, \nI think we can make winter clothes that can be sold at a high price.

18103054.text:
For those who complete 
[2] of the tasks requested by Pungbaekmun in the Haeryong Mountains,
Of course, we will reward them accordingly.
Please help us.

18103055.text: I will give a special reward in the name of Geumgyeongcheolmun to those who perform the cooperative operation of Geumgyeongcheolmun in the Haeryong Mountains. \nI promise. \nIt only takes [2] times!

18103056.text: In Dohwasangjeon, we give a small reward to those who complete \n[2] of the Sangjeon's Haeryongsan Mountains.

18103057.text:
If you complete [2] of the cooperative actions reported by Suyang in the Haeryong Mountains, 
I will give you a special reward.
This is a special reward in the name of the captain.
Then I wish you good luck.

18103058.text:
Younggyowon is giving rewards to adventurers who do 
[2] of the sidewalks we give them in the Haeryongsan Mountains! 
Our barongs keep their promises!
Then stay strong~

18103059.text:
We, Myunghyedan, believe that we should give proper rewards to adventurers who help us with their quests.
If you help us [2] times in the Haeryong Mountains,
You can expect a reward.
Then

18103060.text: In Ereda, special rewards are given to adventurers who complete \n[2] of the cooperative actions reported by the Haeryong Mountains.\nPlease join us in eradicating the spirit of fire horses.

18103061.text: Bisamun is grateful to the adventurers who deal with it.\nPlease complete [2] cases of cooperation reported by the residents of the Haeryong Mountains. \nThen we will be waiting for you.

18103062.text: The bark of a tree spirit can be a good medicine if it is well dried. The air in the northern part of the Gray Sky Forest is not good, so I am concerned about the condition... but it may have a better medicinal effect. Can I ask you a favor?

18103063.text: We are doing our best to ensure the safety of the Giant Forest in Suyang, but there are so many enemies we have to deal with. With a little help, we can focus on our mission even more.

18103064.text: I'm trying to gather herbs in the forest of giants... Mandala flowers follow me everywhere I go, screaming! At first, I covered my ears and tried to focus on my work... I just can't stand it.

18103065.text: Have you heard that the predator's skin has good elasticity? If you use it and fix it on the wound, it will be easy to move and recover quickly. It will be helpful for our members of the Poongbaekmun.

18103066.text: Ereda's supply is in poor condition. I think a wagon will arrive soon, but... First of all, I'm going to try to be self-sufficient. Grab the ragweed at the entrance to the Dark Forest and gather grass for first aid.

18103067.text: When it comes to making money, I don't choose a particular job. The one-eyed retina has many possibilities. I had a lot of trouble figuring out how to capture and use the one-eyed, but if this succeeds, I can make a lot of money. I'll check it out.

18103068.text: Now, Young Gyowon has come to a situation where it is impossible to fill the necessary herbs simply by gathering! Now, I have to grow them myself. To do that, I need seeds... First of all, I'm going to try an experiment with pickled plants.

18103069.text: There are many places to go when looking for materials, so you have to be able to protect yourself. However, dangerous things are dangerous. We are not experts in combat.

18103070.text: Newcomers to Myunghyedan ​​find it difficult to find a research topic. Do you think there are too many studies already done? However, they seem to have a lot of fresh ideas.

18103071.text: In Ereda, our goal is to infiltrate the arsenal. We are trying to intercept the enemy secretly from out of sight, but it doesn't work as we thought because guard dogs are on patrol. Could you go to the Black Dawn Armory and get rid of some guard dogs?

18103072.text: No matter how much I like money, I don't sell weapons to the Black Dawn. I was a little worried, but... that's an act of reducing the overall profit. Wouldn't it be more profitable to take the Black Dawn's weapons in the meantime?

18103073.text: The new member of Poongbaekmun was defeated in a fight with the guard dog. The guard dogs at the supply station are not normal. Their nutritional status is so good that they have a lot of strength.

18103074.text: We use the fats of various animals to make the necessary ingredients. Hyojo's fat has excellent quality and can be used to make high-quality equipment.

18103075.text: There is someone who wants to study the fabric of the Black Dawn. It's not a normal outfit... They want to investigate a functional fiber that can last for a long time even in a contaminated crater.

18103076.text: When there are scars caused by injuries during the operation, I was proud of it like a medal... But many people don't like scars very much. So, Poongbaekmun Pharmacopoeia is researching how to use and treat the skin of Pungbaekmun.

18103077.text: Sooyang wants to make the hills of predators safe under our jurisdiction, but the resistance is unexpectedly strong. If the number of Hyojos and tigers decreases, the construction of defense bases will be accelerated, and then the hills will be stabilized soon.
